title: A cabal of male Liberals signals Ley’s reign is ending. But the day of a colleague’s memorial is obscene timing
summary_full: As images of a secret meeting were splashed all over the media, it became clear the internal plot to oust the leader has descended into political melodramaThe images of a cabal of rightwing Liberal men gathering for clandestine talks to overthrow the party’s first female leader – hours before a memorial service for a late former colleague, no less – confirmed two things.First, the internal plot to oust Sussan Ley has descended into a political melodrama. Continue reading...
